verses.text: Ephraim's \w food|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H0669"\w* \w the|strong="H5437"\w* wind, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* goes after \w the|strong="H5437"\w* east wind: \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* destruction \w are|strong="H3478"\w* increasing day \w by|strong="H3478"\w* day; \w they|strong="H4820"\w* \w make|strong="H5437"\w* \w an|strong="H5437"\w* agreement \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Assyria, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w take|strong="H5973"\w* oil \w into|strong="H3063"\w* Egypt.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w has|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* cause \w against|strong="H5973"\w* Judah, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* give punishment \w to|strong="H4714"\w* Jacob \w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* ways; \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* give \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* reward \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* acts.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* body \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* mother \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brother \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* foot, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* strength \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* fighting \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*;

\w He|strong="H0430"\w* \w had|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H0251"\w* fight \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* angel \w and|strong="H0430"\w* overcame \w him|strong="H0853"\w*; \w he|strong="H0430"\w* made request \w for|strong="H0430"\w* grace \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* weeping; \w he|strong="H0430"\w* came face \w to|strong="H0430"\w* face \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* Beth-el \w and|strong="H0430"\w* there \w his|strong="H0854"\w* words came \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*;

Even \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Lord, \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H1008"\w* \w of|strong="H4397"\w* armies; \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* name.

So \w then|strong="H3068"\w*, \w come|strong="H6635"\w* back \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; keep \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* right, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* waiting \w at|strong="H3068"\w* all times \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w As|strong="H4941"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* Canaan, \w the|strong="H0413"\w* scales \w of|strong="H0430"\w* deceit \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* hands; \w he|strong="H0430"\w* takes pleasure \w in|strong="H0413"\w* twisted ways.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* Ephraim said, \w Now|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H0157"\w* \w got|strong="H6231"\w* wealth \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w much|strong="H3027"\w* property; \w in|strong="H3027"\w* all \w my|strong="H3027"\w* works no sin may \w be|strong="H3027"\w* seen \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H4820"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0389"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* am \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w* \w from|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Egypt; \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* give \w you|strong="H0834"\w* tents \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* living-places again \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* days \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* holy meeting.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* word came \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ears \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* prophets \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* gave \w them|strong="H3427"\w* visions \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* number, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* mouths \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* prophets \w I|strong="H0595"\w* made use \w of|strong="H0776"\w* comparisons.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* Gilead there \w is|strong="H3027"\w* evil. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* quite without value; \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Gilgal \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H1819"\w* offerings \w of|strong="H3027"\w* oxen; truly \w their|strong="H5921"\w* altars \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w like|strong="H1819"\w* masses \w of|strong="H3027"\w* stones \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hollows \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* ploughed field.

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* Jacob \w went|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* flight \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* Aram, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* Israel \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* servant \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* wife, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* wife \w he|strong="H0518"\w* kept sheep.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H0802"\w* \w a|strong="H3290"\w* prophet \w the|strong="H5647"\w* Lord \w made|strong="H0802"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* come up out \w of|strong="H0802"\w* Egypt, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H0802"\w* \w a|strong="H3290"\w* prophet \w he|strong="H0802"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* safe.

\w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w been|strong="H5927"\w* bitterly moved \w to|strong="H3068"\w* wrath \w by|strong="H3068"\w* Ephraim; \w so|strong="H5927"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* blood \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* make \w his|strong="H8104"\w* shame \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w back|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.
